Name: Super Vili
About the game: Help minister of health destroy deadly virus! Finish 21 levels in this 2D action platformer, collect stuff that fell from the truck, shoot masks on virus mutations or squish them all! Controls: MOVE - ARROWS or A and D keys JUMP - SPACEBAR (KEY) or L1, L2, Y or B button FIRE - LCTRL (KEY) or R1, R2, X or A button RUN - HOLD FIRE ACTION PAUSE GAME - ESC or P (KEY) or START button Hints: - masks are not 100% efficient - use JUMP action on Game Over screen to fast RETRY Super Vili on Croatian nationwide TV: Super Vili on Croatian nationwide newspapers and news portals: -super-vili-skuplja-wc-papir-puca-iz-maske-i-ide-na-sljeme-754006 -vili-u-borbi-protiv-korone-gazi-viruse-i-skuplja-wc-papir-1480341 -price/ministar-inspirirao-programerke-u-nasoj-videoigri-super-vili-maskama-rastjeruje-koronu-15060839
